summary: Frontend testing of Official Teams & Bulletins system for OMEGA Dashboard Community Hub. All 10 features tested successfully. The OfficialTeamsBulletins component renders correctly on Community Hub Overview tab with 3 tabs (Latest Updates, Teams, All Bulletins), 6 official teams, 7 bulletins with severity badges (CRITICAL, WARNING, INFO, RESOLVED), NEW badges, search and filter functionality, team and bulletin detail drawers, and Quick Guide modal.
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED in communityMockData.js - OFFICIAL_TEAMS, generateTeamBulletins(), BULLETIN_SEVERITY are all mock data
OfficialTeamsBulletins component has proper data-testid attributes: official-teams-bulletins, tab-feed, tab-teams, tab-archive, team-card-{id}, bulletin-{id}
Severity badges correctly styled: CRITICAL (red), WARNING (yellow), INFO (blue), RESOLVED (green)
NEW badges display with animate-pulse effect on new bulletins
Team drawer shows lead info, member list with online status, and recent bulletins
Bulletin drawer shows full content, attachments, tags, read count, and Acknowledge button
Archive tab has working search and severity filter functionality
Quick Guide modal has 7 pages with Previous/Next navigation
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: Mock data provided by OFFICIAL_TEAMS (6 teams) and generateTeamBulletins() (7 bulletins) in communityMockData.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: Official Teams & Bulletins feature fully tested. Key test IDs: official-teams-bulletins, tab-feed, tab-teams, tab-archive, team-card-{id}, bulletin-{id}, tool-quickguide. Teams: Medical Response, Security & Perimeter, Communications, Engineering & Power, Supply & Logistics, Nature & Foraging. Bulletins have severity levels (critical, warning, info, success) with corresponding badges. Quick Guide modal works via page.evaluate click due to overlay interception issues.

official_teams_bulletins_section_renders.details: Official Teams & Updates section renders on Community Hub Overview tab below Skill Coverage Overview with '3 NEW' badge

latest_updates_tab.details: Latest Updates tab shows pinned/new bulletins with severity badges (WARNING, INFO, CRITICAL) and NEW badges

teams_tab_shows_6_teams.details: Teams tab shows all 6 official teams: Medical Response Team (3 members, Lead: Lisa), Security & Perimeter (2 members, Lead: Marcus), Communications Team, Engineering & Power, Supply & Logistics, Nature & Foraging

archive_tab_search_filter.details: Archive tab shows all bulletins with search input ('Search bulletins...') and severity filter buttons (All, CRITICAL, WARNING, INFO, RESOLVED). Search for 'poison' filters correctly. CRITICAL filter shows only critical bulletins.

bulletin_detail_drawer.details: Clicking bulletin opens detail drawer with: team name, severity badge, title, author, timestamp, full content, tags (#ham, #emergency, #comms-down), read count ('Read by 3 members'), Close and Acknowledge buttons

team_detail_drawer.details: Clicking team card opens team drawer with: team name, description, Team Lead (Lisa Wong - DOC - ONLINE), Team Members (3) with online status indicators, Recent Bulletins (1) with severity and NEW badges, Post New Bulletin button

new_badges_display.details: NEW badges display on new bulletins with cyan/teal color and animate-pulse effect

severity_badges_display.details: Severity badges display correctly: CRITICAL (red with AlertTriangle icon), WARNING (yellow with AlertCircle icon), INFO (blue with Info icon), RESOLVED (green with CheckCircle icon)

quick_guide_modal.details: Quick Guide modal opens when clicking Quick Guide button in toolbar. Shows 7 pages: Welcome to OMEGA, Communication Hub, Community Hub, LOGS & Analytics, Search Everything, Quick Tools, Need Help. Has Previous/Next navigation and progress dots.

tab_navigation.details: Navigation between tabs (Latest Updates, Teams, All Bulletins) works correctly with proper tab highlighting

screenshots_taken: 03_community_hub_scrolled.jpeg - Community Hub scrolled to Official Teams section
05_team_drawer.jpeg - Medical Response Team drawer with lead, members, bulletins
06_archive_tab.jpeg - Archive tab with search and filter
09_bulletin_drawer.jpeg - HAM Repeater Down bulletin detail drawer

mocked_apis_list: OFFICIAL_TEAMS - 6 teams (Medical, Security, Comms, Engineering, Supply, Nature)
BULLETIN_SEVERITY - severity configuration (critical, warning, info, success)
generateActivityLogs() - activity logs for team members
